<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete an integration</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/integrations/{integration_uuid}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the Integration for the given UUID

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"integration_uuid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier of the integration.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Integration was successfully deleted

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>

Internal server error. There was a system failure in the platform.
